comment: Abstract class for calling any constructor that takes arguments when creating an object.
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Abstract class for calling any constructor that takes arguments when creating an object.&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Abstract class for calling any constructor that takes arguments when creating an object.

methods.label: getMeTypeForDebug
methods.comment: Creates a prefix for debug messages
methods.codesample:
%REM
The following code can be included in a base class&apos;s method. TypeName() will be called on the current object. So if debug is enabled, a message will be written that makes it clear which derived class&apos;s createObject() method is being called.
%END REM
Call DebugPrint_Samsara(&quot;Entering &quot; & Me.getMeTypeForDebug & &quot;.createObject&quot;)
methods.commenthtml: Creates a prefix for debug messages
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM&lt;br /&gt;The following code can be included in a base class&apos;s method. TypeName() will be called on the current object. So if debug is enabled, a message will be written that makes it clear which derived class&apos;s createObject() method is being called.&lt;br /&gt;%END REM&lt;br /&gt;Call DebugPrint_Samsara(&quot;Entering &quot; & Me.getMeTypeForDebug & &quot;.createObject&quot;)

methods.label: createObject
